lyrics:
[intro] (D) (C) (G) (D) x2
 
The (D)world is spinnin' too fast
I'm (C)buyin' lead Nike shoes
To (G)keep myself tethered
To the (D)days I tried to lose
 
My (D)mama said to slow down (they do the bump)
You (C)must make your own shoes (they do the bump)
Stop (G)dancin' to the music (they do the bump)
Of Go-(D)rillaz in a happy mood (they do the bump)
 
Keep a mild (D) groove on, (C)(they do the bump)
(G)(They do the bump) (D)(they do the bump)
(D)(They do the bump) (C)(they do the bump)
(G)(They do the bump) (D)(they do the bump)
(D) There ya go!
Get the (D)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (C)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the (G)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (D)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the (D)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (C)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the (G)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (D)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
(D) (C) (G) (D)
 
There's a (D)monkey in the jungle
Wat(C)chin' a vapour trail
(G)Caught up in the conflict
Between his (D)brain and his tail
 
And if (D)time's elimination (they do the bump)
Then we (C)got nothin' to lose (they do the bump)
(G)Please repeat the message (they do the bump)
It's the (D)music that we choose (they do the bump)
 
Keep a mild (D) groove on, (C)(they do the bump)
(G)(They do the bump) (D)(they do the bump)
(D)(They do the bump) (C)(they do the bump)
(G)(They do the bump) (D)(they do the bump)
 
(D)OK, bring it down, yeah, we gonna break out
Get the (D)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (C)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the (G)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (D)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the (D)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (C)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the (G)cool! (Na nana na-na-na)
Get the cool (D)shoeshine! (Na nana na-na-na)
 
[outro]
(D) Na nana na-na-na (C) na nana na-na-na
(G) Na nana na-na-na (D) na nana na-na-na
(D) [end]
